an5.143:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
an5.143:4.2: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya vesāliṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
an5.143:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena pañcamattānaṃ licchavisatānaṃ sārandade cetiye sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
an5.143:4.6: Hatthiratanassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ, assaratanassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ, maṇiratanassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ, itthiratanassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ, gahapatiratanassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ.
an5.143:4.7: Imesaṃ pañcannaṃ ratanānaṃ pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmin”ti.
an5.143:5.1: Atha kho te licchavī magge purisaṃ ṭhapesuṃ:
an5.143:5.2: “yadā tvaṃ, ambho purisa, passeyyāsi bhagavantaṃ, atha amhākaṃ āroceyyāsī”ti.
an5.143:5.3: Addasā kho so puriso bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ;
an5.143:5.6: “ayaṃ so, bhante, bhagavā gacchati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho;
an5.143:6.1: Atha kho te licchavī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
an5.143:6.3: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho te licchavī bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
an5.143:7.1: “Sādhu, bhante, yena sārandadaṃ cetiyaṃ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
an5.143:7.3: Atha kho bhagavā yena sārandadaṃ cetiyaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
an5.143:7.5: Nisajja kho bhagavā te licchavī etadavoca:
an5.143:7.6: “kāya nuttha, licchavī, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā, kā ca pana vo antarākathā vippakatā”ti?
an5.143:7.7: “Idha, bhante, amhākaṃ sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
an5.143:7.10: Hatthiratanassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ, assaratanassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ, maṇiratanassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ, itthiratanassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ, gahapatiratanassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ.
an5.143:7.11: Imesaṃ pañcannaṃ ratanānaṃ pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmin’”ti.
an5.143:8.1: “Kāmādhimuttānaṃ vata bho licchavīnaṃ kāmaṃyeva ārabbha antarākathā udapādi*.
an5.143:8.2: Pañcannaṃ, licchavī, ratanānaṃ pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ.
an5.143:8.4: Tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ, tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desetā puggalo dullabho lokasmiṃ, tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa viññātā puggalo dullabho lokasmiṃ, tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa viññātā dhammānudhammappaṭipanno puggalo dullabho lokasmiṃ, kataññū katavedī puggalo dullabho lokasmiṃ.
an5.143:8.5: Imesaṃ kho, licchavī, pañcannaṃ ratanānaṃ pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmin”ti.
